derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, or from late Latin objectio(n-), from the verb obicere (see object)

entry.def: If you make or raise an objection to something, you say that you do not like it or agree with it.

example.ex: Some managers have recently raised objection to the PFA handling these negotiations...
example.tran: 一些主教练最近就英格兰职业足球运动员协会负责这些谈判提出了异议。

example.ex: Despite objections by the White House, the Senate voted today to cut off aid.
example.tran: 参议院不顾白宫的反对于今天投票决定中止援助。

entry.def: If you say that you have no objection to something, you mean that you are not annoyed or bothered by it.

example.ex: I have no objection to banks making money...
example.tran: 我对银行营利并不抵触。

example.ex: I no longer have any objection to your going to see her.
example.tran: 我不会再因为你去见她而不高兴。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of expressing earnest opposition or protest
3. the act of protesting; a public (often organized) manifestation of dissent

4. (law) a procedure whereby a party to a suit says that a particular line of questioning or a particular witness or a piece of evidence or other matter is improper and should not be continued and asks the court to rule on its impropriety or illegality

auth_sentence.content: The judge got to shout triumphantly, objection overruled!

stems_affixes.word_buile: ab离开+ject抛→抛掉→可怜的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 形容词的,用作形容词的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad增加+ject投掷,扔+ive……的→扔上去的,附加的
deject[v.使沮丧, 使灰心]+ed表形容词→adj.沮丧的,失望的
object[n.物体;客体,对象;目标;宾语 v.[to]反对]+ive……的→客观的[词性变化:作名词,表示"目标,目的"]
sub在下面+ject投掷,扔→扔下去→服从的,扔下去大家讨论的主题
ad增加+ject投掷,扔+ive……的→扔上去的,附加的
eject[v.投出,掷出]+ion表名词→n.喷出, 排出物
inter在……中间+ject投掷,扔+ion表名词→在句子中间扔出的字→感叹词

stems_affixes.value_cn: 物体;客体,对象;目标;宾语
stems_affixes.word_buile: ob逆,反+ject投掷,扔→反着扔→反对→引申为扔向目标

stems_affixes.value_cn: [to]反对,异议,不喜欢,反对的理由

object[n.物体;客体,对象;目标;宾语 v.[to]反对]+ive……的→客观的[词性变化:作名词,表示"目标,目的"]
pro向前+ject扔→扔向前面→投射;引申为工程项目
project[v.投射出;n.工程项目]+ile物体→向前扔的物体
project[v.投射出;n.工程项目]+ion表名词→n.射出,投射;计划
re回+ject扔回来→拒绝
reject[v.拒绝,抵制,丢弃,排斥,退掉 n.落选者]+ion表名词→n.退回,拒绝
sub在下面+ject投掷,扔→扔下去→服从的,扔下去大家讨论的主题
subject[n.主题;学科 adj.隶属的;易遭..的 v.使隶属]+ion表名词→n.征服
subject主观+ivity表名词→n.主观性, 主观
tra穿+ject投掷,扔+ory范围→扔出去穿过的范围→弹道轨道
con共同+ject投掷,扔+ure表名词→大家一起扔[思想]→推测
de向下+ject投掷,扔→情绪向下扔→沮丧
e出+ject掷→掷出
in进入+ject投掷,扔→扔进去→注射
ob逆,反+ject投掷,扔→反着扔→反对→引申为扔向目标
pro向前+ject扔→扔向前面→投射;引申为工程项目

means.word_mean: 反对, 异议; 厌恶

sentences.en: They made an objection to the imperial system with resolution.
Please present your objection to the plan.
sentences.cn: 请提出反对这个计划的理由。

jushi.english: Please present your objection to the plan.
jushi.chinese: 请提出反对这个计划的理由。

jushi.english: They made an objection to the imperial system with resolution.
The little boy has a strong objection to getting up so early.
